snippet.title: [OP] Red Embrace: Hollywood
snippet.description:
Begin your journey as a vampire in Hollywood—where you can be anything, because you're already dead.

Red Embrace: Hollywood is a vampire visual novel that features a customizable protagonist (female, male, or nonbinary), 3 male love interests, and over a thousand choices that shape you and the world around you.

PLAY ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/904520/Red_Embrace_Hollywood/

PLAY ON ITCH: https://argent-games.itch.io/red-embrace-hollywood

DOWNLOAD THE DEMO: https://argent-games.itch.io/red-embrace-hollywood

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/argent_games
TUMBLR: https://blog.argentgames.co/
DISCORD: https://discordapp.com/invite/5SrFgVY
WEBSITE: http://argentgames.co/
